6. The processing data generation device according to claim 5, whereinthe processing device is configured to draw on the workpiece using a pen, and
the computer-readable instructions further instruct the processor to perform a process comprising:
contour processing of generating, for each of the plurality of pattern pieces, contour drawing data for drawing the contour of the pattern piece on the workpiece, per group.

7. The processing data generation device according to claim 6, whereinthe processing line processing includes generating, for at least some of pattern pieces, from among the plurality of pattern pieces, the processing line processing data for processing the workpiece along the processing line set, with respect to the pattern piece, to be inverted in relation to a reference, andthe contour processing includes generating, for the at least some of the plurality of pattern pieces, the contour drawing data for drawing, on the workpiece, the contour of the pattern piece inverted in relation to the reference.

8. The processing data generation device according to claim 5, whereinthe computer-readable instructions further instruct the processor to perform a process comprising:identification information processing of generating identification drawing data for drawing identification information, the identification information identifying the adjacent portion adjacent to the second piece, in each of the two pattern pieces adjacent to each other of the plurality of pattern pieces, and being common to the adjacent portion of the first piece and the adjacent portion of the second piece.

9. The processing data generation device according to claim 1, whereinthe offset setting processing includes setting, in each of the two pattern pieces adjacent to each other, the offset line using a pattern common to the adjacent portion of the first piece and the adjacent portion of the second piece, at a position offset by the predetermined distance to the outside from the adjacent portion, of the contour of the pattern piece.

10. The processing data generation device according to claim 1, whereinthe computer-readable instructions further instruct the processor to perform a process comprising:shape setting processing of setting a shape encompassing the pattern,the division processing includes dividing a margin pattern into a plurality of pattern pieces, the margin pattern representing a portion between the pattern and the shape,the offset setting processing includes setting the offset line for each of the plurality of pattern pieces representing the pattern as a whole and for each of the plurality of pattern pieces representing the margin pattern as a whole, andthe processing line processing includes generating the processing line processing data for each of the plurality of pattern pieces representing the pattern as a whole and for each of the plurality of pattern pieces representing the margin pattern as a whole.

11. A non-transitory computer-readable medium storing computer-readable instructions that are executed by a processor of a processing data generation device, the computer-readable instructions performing processes comprising:acquiring processing of acquiring a pattern represented by a contour;division processing of dividing the pattern into a plurality of pattern pieces;offset setting processing of setting an offset line, for each of two pattern pieces adjacent to each other from among the plurality of pattern pieces representing the pattern as a whole, the offset line being disposed at a position separated to an outside, from an adjacent portion, by a predetermined distance, the adjacent portion being a portion of the contour of a first piece, the first piece being one of the two pattern pieces, the adjacent portion being adjacent to a second piece, the second piece being another of the two pattern pieces, and the outside being opposite, with respect to the contour of the first piece, to a region surrounded by the contour of the first piece,processing line setting processing of setting, for each of the plurality of pattern pieces, a processing line including the offset line and surrounding a pattern piece from among the plurality of pattern pieces; andprocessing line processing of generating processing line processing data, for each of the plurality of pattern pieces, for processing a sheet-shaped workpiece along the processing line, using a processing device configured to perform processing on the workpiece.

12. A sewing machine, comprising:a presser bar configured to press a sewing object from above, a presser foot being configured to be mounted to a lower end portion of the presser bar;a processor; anda memory configured to store computer-readable instructions that, when executed by the processor, instruct the processor to perform processes comprising:acquiring processing of acquiring a pattern represented by a contour;division processing of dividing the pattern into a plurality of pattern pieces;predetermined distance setting processing of setting a predetermined distance depending on a type of the presser foot mounted to the lower end portion of the presser bar,offset setting processing of setting an offset line, for each of two pattern pieces adjacent to each other from among the plurality of pattern pieces representing the pattern as a whole, the offset line being disposed at a position separated to an outside, from an adjacent portion, by the predetermined distance, the adjacent portion being a portion of the contour of a first piece, the first piece being one of the two pattern pieces, the adjacent portion being adjacent to a second piece, the second piece being another of the two pattern pieces, and the outside being opposite, with respect to the contour of the first piece, to a region surrounded by the contour of the first piece,processing line setting processing of setting, for each of the plurality of pattern pieces, a processing line including the offset line and surrounding a pattern piece from among the plurality of pattern pieces; andprocessing line processing of generating processing line processing data, for each of the plurality of pattern pieces, for processing a sheet-shaped workpiece along the processing line, using a processing device configured to perform processing on the workpiece.
